altername_name: Sega Ages: Rouka ni Ichidanto R
name: Sega Ages: Rouka Ni Ichidant-R
overview: Sega Ages Rouka ni Ichidant-R (SEGA AGES 廊下にイチダントアール) is a compilation released under the "Sega Ages" line for the Sega Saturn. It includes a port of Puzzle & Action: Ichidant-R and Quiz Rouka ni Tattenasai! and was released exclusively in Japan in 1996.
